definition: to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
to reduce the pressure (of a fluid)/to lower one's blood pressure/to lower (or step down) the voltage
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
